title: Lore in League
body:
{{champion:136}}  I am Aurelion Sol, the Star Forger. I was already ancient by the time stellar debris first coalesced into worlds. DIE!!!!!!!!!!

*Killed by yordle with blowgun*

Could Riot put some effort into making the lore more realistic?

replies.body: The connection between gameplay and lore has ben tossed out for years now. No League or Institute so no lore justification for gameplay to exist as it does. They're more or less seperate entities that pay homage to each other rather than being exact parrallels.

> [{quoted}](name=Stormshadow3503,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0fto6Iee,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-20T00:01:37.522+0000)
>

A dragon killed by a demon seems balanced to me.

>
> A dragon killed by a demon seems balanced to me.

Maybe to you, terror of Zaun, but an ancient being like Sol deserves more credit than what you.
That ain't lol son. You are talking about gameplay. Gameplay doesn't reflect lore.

Because Teemo killing Aurelion Sol isn't something that's happened in the Lore.  It's only something that can happen in game.  

The in-game stuff that happens is just considered gameplay and isn't canon to the overall story.

Aurelion's death and revival lines imply that he's actually just letting the mortals have their temporary victory because it's fun to him.

Also, the game has no reality in the lore anymore. (It's kinda sad, but it did make the lore more open and varied)
This would be understandable, but the fact that a substantial amount of people complained about the Piltover lore rework seems a bit odd, considering nobody cares about this

....

Wait, what?

People weren't complaining about Piltover (as far as I could tell it was just Viktor and Orianna, at most)

And what does Piltover have to do with Aurelion Sol?

Their background. We know lore and gameplay shouldn't be connected but its just illogical and it sucks. Piltover's Caitlyn has a sniper who's a good shot. Shadow Isle's Kalista whom is undead and brings vengeance for many all across Runeterra is countered by Caitlyn (she sucks in general but you know). It just sounds kinda dumb.
